meanings.definition: A plan for carrying out a process or procedure, giving lists of intended events and times.
meanings.sent1: My school schedule tells me when to go to each class.
meanings.sent2: I always check the bus schedule to make sure I don't miss my ride.
meanings.sent3: The cat made its own schedule for nap times and meal times.
meanings.sent4: Her schedule was as precise as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Following a schedule helps me stay organized and on track.

meanings.sent1: The train schedule shows all the departure and arrival times.
meanings.sent2: I need to create a schedule for studying for my exams.
meanings.sent3: The schedule for the party had everyone laughing because it was so detailed.
meanings.sent4: His schedule was like a map guiding him through the day.
meanings.sent5: Having a schedule makes it easier to manage my time effectively.
